subject: Good Day,
body:
Good Day,
I would like to present a private proposition to you that could benefit both of us regarding a probate file at my office. I will provide the details once you acknowledge this email. Please respond at your earliest convenience for complete information.
Kind regards,
Lili Bark

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Hello Lili Bark,

Good day to you too! Your message sounds intriguing, I must say. Could you please provide more details about this probate file? What exactly does it entail and how could it potentially benefit us?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Richard
